text: @tribelaw Yep, I'm the POTUS, who has sworn an oath to protect you I deny COVID19 is an epidemic that could result in your death.  I want you to come to my rally and profess your undying adoration for me.  But, please sign this just in case.  Don't want you to sue me cause your stupid.
